Address.value: 700 WEST PENDER STREET,SUITE 1501, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6C 1G8, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Equinox Gold is a growth-focused gold producer operating entirely in the Americas, with projects in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil. Equinox Gold has seven operating mines and a clear path to achieve more than one million ounces of annual gold production from a pipeline of development and expansion projects.
